Why does MC need my personal info?: Keng ha MC e hloka lesedi la hao la botho?
What personal info is collected?: Ke lesedi lefe la botho le bokellwang?
Who can see my personal info?: Ke mang ya ka bonang sedi la ka la botho?
How can I see, change or delete my perso: Nka le bona,ka le fetola ka le tima jwang sedi la botho?
How long does MC keep my info?: MC e boloka lesedi nako e kae?
MomConnect needs your personal info to s: MomConnect e hloka dintlha tsa hao tsa botho ho romela melaetsa e nepaneng le boemo ba hao ba boimana kapa boholo ba lesea la hao. Ka ho tseba hore o ngodiseditse MomConnect kae, Lefapha la Bophelo le ka etsa bonnete hore bomme ba sebeletswa tleleniking ya hao. Ho tseba moo o  ngodiseditseng ho thusa Lefapha la Bophelo ho amohela thoholetso kapa tletlebo tseo di romelang MomConnect ka tleleniki ya hao.
MomConnect collects your phone and ID nu: MomConnect e bokella dinomoro  tsa hao tsa fono le ID, sebaka sa tleleniki, le lesedi mabapi le hore boimana ba hao bo tswela pele jwang.
You can see, change, or ask us to delete: O ka bona, wa fetola kapa wa re kopa ho tima lesedi la hao ka ho letsetsa *134*550*7#
MomConnect will automatically delete you: MomConnect ka ho iketsahalla e tla tima lesedi la hao la botho dilemo tse 7 le dikgwedi tse 9 ka mora ho ngodisa.
Sorry, that number is not recognised. Di: Tshwarelo, nomoro ha e tsejwe.Tobetsa nomoro o e sebedisitseng pele ho ngodisa. Ho ntjhafatsa nomoro ya hao, letsetsa *134*550*7# kapa ngodisa hape tleleniking.
